mapper.select: SELECT SIGNON.USERNAME, ACCOUNT.EMAIL, ACCOUNT.FIRSTNAME, ACCOUNT.LASTNAME, ACCOUNT.STATUS, ACCOUNT.ADDRESS, ACCOUNT.PHONE, ACCOUNT.NICKNAME, ACCOUNT.BANK, ACCOUNT.CARDNUMBER, ACCOUNT.CVC, ACCOUNT.EXPIRYDATE, ACCOUNT.CARDPASSWORD, PROFILE.LANGPREF AS languagePreference, PROFILE.FAVCATEGORY AS favouriteCategoryId, PROFILE.MYLISTOPT AS listOption, PROFILE.BANNEROPT AS bannerOption, BANNERDATA.BANNERNAME FROM ACCOUNT, PROFILE, SIGNON, BANNERDATA WHERE ACCOUNT.USERID = #{username} AND SIGNON.USERNAME = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.USERID = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.FAVCATEGORY = BANNERDATA.FAVCATEGORY

SELECT SIGNON.USERNAME, ACCOUNT.EMAIL, ACCOUNT.FIRSTNAME, ACCOUNT.LASTNAME, ACCOUNT.STATUS, ACCOUNT.ADDRESS, ACCOUNT.PHONE, ACCOUNT.NICKNAME, ACCOUNT.BANK, ACCOUNT.CARDNUMBER, ACCOUNT.CVC, ACCOUNT.EXPIRYDATE, ACCOUNT.CARDPASSWORD, PROFILE.LANGPREF AS languagePreference, PROFILE.FAVCATEGORY AS favouriteCategoryId, PROFILE.MYLISTOPT AS listOption, PROFILE.BANNEROPT AS bannerOption, BANNERDATA.BANNERNAME FROM ACCOUNT, PROFILE, SIGNON, BANNERDATA WHERE ACCOUNT.USERID = #{param1} AND SIGNON.PASSWORD = #{param2} AND SIGNON.USERNAME = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.USERID = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.FAVCATEGORY = BANNERDATA.FAVCATEGORY
SELECT USERNAME AS VALUE FROM SIGNON
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET EMAIL = #{email}, FIRSTNAME = #{firstName}, LASTNAME = #{lastName}, STATUS = #{status}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PHONE = #{phone}, NICKNAME = #{nickName}, BANK = #{bank}, CARDNUMBER = #{cardNumber}, CVC = #{cvc}, EXPIRYDATE = #{expiryDate}, CARDPASSWORD = #{cardPassword} WHERE USERID = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (EMAIL, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, STATUS, ADDRESS, PHONE, NICKNAME, BANK, CARDNUMBER, CVC, EXPIRYDATE, CARDPASSWORD, USERID) VALUES (#{email}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{status}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{nickName}, #{bank}, #{cardNumber}, #{cvc}, #{expiryDate}, #{cardPassword}, #{username})
INSERT INTO PROFILE (LANGPREF, FAVCATEGORY, USERID) VALUES (#{languagePreference}, #{favouriteCategoryId}, #{username})
mapper.update: UPDATE SIGNON SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
